name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!
Adds 130 cards, 4 relics, 2 potions and new buff/debuff powers exclusively to the Duelist character.

REQUIREMENTS
Basemod, StSLib, Replay the Spire, Conspire, Spike's Relics, The Servant, Slimebound

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.130.0
- Added 2 new cards: Pot of Duality, Dark Factory
- Nerfed many cards slightly
- Nerfed summon increment relic, reduced rarity to uncommon
- Buffed energy gain relic
- Nerfed Summoner orb slightly
- Buffer orb now pulls from large pool of random buffs when evoked
- Card Destruction+ now gives upgraded cards instead of 2 cards/discard
- Summoning in general should be more scarce
- Insect Queen always removes at least 1 max summon now, even when upgraded
- Fixed Tomb Looter power
- Changed Imperial Order completely

v1.128.1
- All cards should now properly respect Strength and Dexterity (for real)
- Fixed Superheavy Brawler not tributing properly
- Made sure Superheavy Swordsman and Superheavy Ogre do not target unless upgraded
- Fixed Ookazi text
- Fixed Shard of Greed triggering 3 turns after you play it
- Added 1 new buff to large random buff pool
- Changed 'Creative AI' random buff to only ever give 1 card
- Fixed Gravity Axe crash
- Various balance changes

v1.128.0
- Added 24 new cards
- Strength and Dexterity are still probably not being applied correctly to many cards; will be fixed in next build

v1.104.0
- Fixed cards not being affected by strength properly
- Fixed some cards not being affected by dexterity properly
- Readded Harpie's Feather Duster
- Added Big Castle Wall
- Added block gain to several cards
- Increased block gain on several cards
- Reduced rarity of several block cards
- Millennium Shield now gives 5 dexterity
- Dark Hole now steals block instead of just removing it



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
